thread.title: Ellen Maxine Smith
thread.title_full: webuyanycar.com reviewed by Ellen Maxine Smith

author: Ellen Maxine Smith
title: Ellen Maxine Smith
text: The entire experience was very up- front and professional. I never felt pressured to accept the offer they made me for my Buick. But , I felt it was a fair offer so I did take it. Overall it was a very pleasant and simple way to sell a car. I would highly recommend them to anyone.
